search_results.snippet:
SHORT STORIES: In an 1842 tale he wrote, "Down--still unceasingly--still 
inevitably down!... I shrunk .... CLASSICAL MUSIC: In 1741, if oratorio lovers 
asked this composer, "Where's your 'Messiah' now?", he could say, "I just finished 
it".
search_results.title: Jeopary Questions page 413 - LET ME PAINT YOU A PICTURE ...

question: In 1741, if oratorio lovers asked this composer, "Where's your 'Messiah' now?", he could say, "I just finished it"
